title: Number of visitors to the World War II Memorial in the U.S. 2008 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of visitors in millions, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2011 to 2008.
But, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2019 to 2017.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2017 to 2015.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2015 to 2013.
Additionally, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2013 to 2011.
gold: This statistic shows the number of recreational visitors to the World War II Memorial in the United States from 2008 to 2019 . The number of visitors to the World War II Memorial amounted to approximately 4.83 million in 2019 .
